name: WildLands (Fmlad)
description:
Created by Fmlad for the 48 hour Minijam 124: Warmth Gamejame. Enjoy!

As you venture deeper into the woods, the mist thickens and the trees loom taller. The ruins you stumbled upon seem ancient, with moss-covered stones and ivy crawling over the crumbling walls. The bonfires, unlit for who knows how long, are scattered throughout the ruins, their ashes cold and forgotten.

You can't shake the feeling that you're being watched, as if the very trees themselves are keeping watch over these sacred ruins. But there's also a sense of mystery and intrigue that draws you further in, as if the ruins hold secrets just waiting to be uncovered.

You might want to run the windows version if you are suffering with poor performance in the WEBGL.

- Final Note; Apologies if there are any hard/soft lock game breaking bugs, please notify me if you encounter any and i will fix up asap. There is a lot thrown into this gamejam and It might be my best work for scope, however due to the size, bugs may be present, I did my best after 100's of playthroughs to squash all of them.

Controls:
WASD = Movement
E = Interact
Mouse = Clicking some UI.

Credits:
Art - Fmlad
Coding - Fmlad
Music - Listed below & Freesound.
